name: Blk Orchid & Empress Divine- Single Girl Blues

metadata.name: Blk Orchid & Empress Divine- Single Girl Blues
metadata.description: Blk Orchid and Empress Divine bring authentic Lover's Rock Reggae to the blockchain with their hit Single Girl Blues. Written and produced by both women, it tells a story of dating that everyone can relate to.

lyrics.text:
Single Girl Blues 

Written By Renee Brown and Natasha Brown (Blk Orchid & Empress Divine) 


Most of the time
I like to be alone
But the season is changing now I wish that I was home
Cuddling with someone that would keep me warm for the night
That special someone who would treat me right
But I know
I know I'm not ready for love
That's why I got the Single Girl Blues
And it don't have to be this way, yeah
When I am taken the boys seem to always want my attention (they want my attention)
And when I am single they are nowhere to be found
And when I am serious they only want to play around
Look at my face right now my smile has turned into a frown
And I know
I know I'm not ready for love
That's why I got the Single Girl Blues
I got the Single Girl Blues

(Empress)

I’m single and lonely 

wishing I had someone to hold me

still I’m patiently waiting

right now I’m the one who consoles me

cuz I made up my mind 

that I can stay single until I can find

someone that is mine

to love unconditionally all the time

Looking for love mi naw look fi play no game

Respect and honesty and loyalty mi want the same 

Not a man weh a chase 

Every female pon di lane 

If a suh cupid miss mi when you aim Chuh 

Nuh come in a mi life

And come play wit mi heart

First you want family

Den you want fi part

Baby a never suh we start

Inna yuh love web

Mi naw guh get caught 

Bridge
(La La La La)
This situation is so frustrating
(La La La La)
How will i ever find the one if I don't take the risk of dating
(La La La La)
I been hurt before and don't wanna put myself out there
(La La La La)
I'm only doing this to myself

Cause I know 
I know I'm not ready for love
Cause I know
I know I'm not ready for love
And I know
I know I'm not ready for love
That's why I got the Single Girl Blues
I got the Single Girl Blues

metadata.recordLabel: Blk Orchid Productions, Empress Divine Production
